name: Mortimer Beckett and the Secrets of Spooky Manor
name_original: Mortimer Beckett and the Secrets of Spooky Manor
description: Hunt the halls of the Beckett family mansion in search of mysterious hidden objects and solve a series of brain-bending puzzles to uncover the Spooky Manor mystery. What is this strange machine? Who shattered it into pieces? And what happened to Uncle Jerome? Only those with a keen eye for details will discover the answers hidden in Spooky Manor!
